videos.description: Coby White draws Myles Turner out of the paint and then blows by him to score at the rim.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Coby White schools Myles Turner to score) 2021/12/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Coby White schools Myles Turner to score

videos.description: DeMar DeRozan gets the hoop and the harm for the Bulls in the final seconds of the first half.
